sourcesContent:
Reservas

Fecha de reserva {{element.fechaReserva | date:"dd/MM/YYYY hh:mm"}} Numero de Comensales {{element.comensales}} Menus seleccionados {{element.menus}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { userService } from '../userService'; import { lastValueFrom } from 'rxjs'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Router, UrlSerializer } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-reservas-personal', templateUrl: './reservas-personal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./reservas-personal.component.css'] }) export class ReservasPersonalComponent implements OnInit{ displayedColumns: string[] = ['fechaReserva', 'comensales', 'menus']; dataSource :any; constructor(private http:HttpClient,private userService: userService,private router: Router){ } ngOnInit(): void { if(this.userService.getUser()==null){ this.router.navigate(['/home']) } if(this.userService.getUser().rol=="admin"){ const req=this.http.get('http://localhost:8080/reservas/all'); req.subscribe(aux =>{ this.dataSource=aux; }) }else{ const req=this.http.post('http://localhost:8080/reservas/getReservasID',""+this.userService.getUser().id,{}); req.subscribe(aux =>{ this.dataSource=aux; }) } } }
